column4: i'm having some trouble wit a mounted fat32-partition and international charachters.. it replaces them with ? and says invalid encoding.... any help?
i'm having some trouble wit a mounted fat32-partition and international charachters.. it replaces them with ? and says invalid encoding.... any help?
i'm having some trouble with a mounted fat32-partition and international characters.. it replaces them with ? and says "invalid encoding".... any help?
you'll need to add "utf8" to the options in fstab
